Book

/.section__image
Host  Events in Sebastian, Florida at Capt Hirams Resort
/.section__holder
/.shell
From tropical weddings and family reunions to team retreats and milestone celebrations, Capt Hiram’s Resort is the
ultimate event destination
on Florida’s Treasure Coast. Our laid-back, island-inspired setting and full-service hospitality make planning your special event simple, stress-free, and fun.
Destination Weddings in Sebastian, FL
Make your big day a tropical dream come true.
Our
destination wedding venue in Sebastian, FL
offers scenic waterfront ceremony spaces, sunset receptions, on-site lodging, and expert planning services—perfect for couples looking for a beachy, laid-back wedding experience.
Retirement Party Venue in Sebastian, FL
Celebrate a well-earned milestone in style.
Host your send-off into retirement with beautiful river views, catering, and plenty of space for friends, family, and storytelling at our
retirement party venue in Sebastian, Florida
.
Milestone Celebration Venue on the Indian River
Make life’s big moments even more memorable.
Whether it’s a 50th birthday or golden anniversary, our
milestone celebration event space
offers the perfect mix of festive energy and relaxed coastal charm.
Family Reunion Event Space in Florida
Reconnect and relax with your loved ones.
Our
family reunion event space near Vero Beach
includes flexible indoor/outdoor venues, group lodging options, and activities the whole family will enjoy.
Graduation Party Venue with Tropical Flair
Throw a graduation bash worth remembering.
Celebrate academic success in our
graduation party event venue
with riverfront views, entertainment options, and space for dancing and dining.
Engagement Party Venue in Sebastian, Florida
Pop the bubbly in paradise.
Toast to your future with an unforgettable evening at our
engagement party venue
, ideal for waterfront cocktails and sunset photos.
Rehearsal Dinner Venue by the Waterfront
Ease into your wedding weekend.
Our
rehearsal dinner venue in Sebastian
offers casual or elegant setups with fresh seafood, cocktails, and riverfront dining.
Gender Reveal Party Venue in Florida
Create a magical moment with friends and family.
From custom décor to stunning backdrops, our
gender reveal event space
helps you share your exciting news in a fun and meaningful way.
Unique Party Venue in Sebastian, FL
Throw a party that stands out.
Our
unique party venue on the Indian River
is ideal for those seeking something different—whether it’s a themed celebration, boat party, or island-style bash.
Tropical Event Space in Sebastian, Florida
Host your event with coastal flair.
Capt Hiram’s
tropical event space
features palm trees, beach bars, and breezy outdoor venues that feel like a mini getaway without leaving Florida.
Corporate Event Venue in Sebastian, FL
Inspire your team with a change of scenery.
Our
corporate event venue in Sebastian, Florida
is perfect for meetings, trainings, incentive trips, and executive retreats—complete with group lodging and A/V support.
Team Building Venue on Florida’s East Coast
Strengthen bonds and boost morale.
Take collaboration to the next level with a custom experience at our
team building event space
, where team games meet island vibes.
Company Party Venue with Lodging & Catering
Celebrate company milestones in paradise.
From holiday parties to client appreciation nights, our
company party venue in Sebastian, FL
offers flexible layouts, catering, live music, and bar service.
Event Spaces by Guest Count
Planning a small gathering or a larger celebration? We offer event venues suited to your group size:
Event venue for 100 guests near the Indian River
Large event space for up to 150 guests
Private venue for small group gatherings
Why Choose Capt Hiram’s?
Riverfront views with indoor and outdoor venue options
Full-service catering and bar packages
On-site lodging and group blocks
Friendly, experienced event team
Walkable resort with dining, bars, and entertainment
Start Planning Today
Let us help you create a stress-free, unforgettable event on the water. Whether you’re planning a destination wedding, family celebration, or corporate event, Capt Hiram’s has the perfect space for you.
Contact
Brianna Payne | Catering Manager
email:
events@hirams.com
| call direct:
772-581-6172

/.section__image
Contact Us
/.section__holder
/.shell
WE’RE HERE
TO HELP
Our team is happy and waiting to help you plan your vacation and stay at Capt Hirams Resort. Contact us with questions, requests, and/or concerns. We are here to help and live up to our promise of a relaxing, fun escape for everyone.
Capt Hirams Resort
1580 US Highway 1, Sebastian, Florida 32958
Phone:
772-388-8588
Hotel Reservations
reservations@hirams.com
Marketing Department
marketing@hirams.com
Entertainment Inquiries & Band Booking Information
entertainment@hirams.com

/.section__image
About Us
/.section__holder
/.shell
IT’S FLORIDA
WITH A BAHAMIAN BEAT
Vacationing should be the most relaxing thing you ever do. After all, what more do you need than a cold beer (or perfectly poured scotch), fresh-caught seafood, warm sand, palm trees, and a tropical breeze? Add in a collection of 86 guest rooms and suites with views of the river, live music, riverboat tours, and a full-service marina, and you’ll have Capt Hirams Resort, one of Florida’s most beloved destinations.
A NOD TO OUR HISTORY
Honoring the memory of Sergeant Hiram Collins
Our name is in honor of the memory of Sergeant Hiram Collins, who was the great uncle of our founder, Tom Collins. Sergeant Hiram Collins was a brave World War II soldier who was killed at Normandy Beach. He loved the sea and so will always be known as The Captain at our resort.
RESORT HISTORY
Our founder, Tom Collins, came from Maryland to visit family in the early 80’s. The charm of our small-town fishing village and friendly community convinced him to stay. Capt. Hiram’s Resort got its start in 1986 when Tom purchased The River Raw Bar on Sebastian’s waterfront.
Since then, Capt. Hiram’s has grown from a small marina and raw bar to the area’s largest waterfront resort and restaurant. The River Raw Bar re-opened in 1987 with just 28 seats and has expanded continuously over the years, now accommodating more than 500 guests. Still owned by the Collins family, the resort has grown over the years hand in hand with the Sebastian community. We remain very proud of our ongoing relationships with the many local organizations and businesses in the area.
In the mid 1990s, the Sandbar was added and that casual part of the operation has continuously expanded, most recently with the addition of the Coral Bar, Scoops, Bimini Beach and the Grand Sand Bandstand. The marina has also evolved over the years, growing from a facility with 14 boat slips to today’s full service marina, with 60 slips, our ship’s store and transient facilities for our boating guests.
OUR HOTEL HAS A HISTORY TOO
Each hotel building on property is named after an island in the Bahamas. The entire Collins family, great lovers of the islands, paid tribute to the Bahamas by naming parts of the resort after their favorite Bahamian islands. Our main hotel building is called
Grand Bahamas
, which is the first Bahamian island the family visited.  As we constructed more buildings and hotel accommodations, we added;
Exuma Cay
(Will Collins’ favorite Island),
Abaco Cay
, and
Rum Cay
.  Our
Rum Cay
rooms are the nicest rooms on property with incredible views, and Rum, after all, was Tom Collins’ favorite spirit.
We feel our resort is the closest you can be to the Bahamas without chartering a boat or buying a plane ticket.
Welcome to Bahamas, USA!
